mapper.select: select user_id,nickname from brush_business_user where state = #{state} and (real_name like '%${key}%' or nickname like '%${key}%') order by ((case when real_name like '%${key}%' then 2 else 0 end) + (case when nickname like '%${key}%' then 1 else 0 end)) DESC ,sort DESC limit #{max}

SELECT
t1.id AS bu_id, t1.enabled AS bu_enabled,
bs.id AS bs_id, bs.phone_number AS bs_phone_number, bs.id_card_front_url AS bs_id_card_front_url, bs.id_card_behind_url AS bs_id_card_behind_url, bs.id_card AS bs_id_card, bs.real_name AS bs_real_name, bs.avatar AS bs_avatar, bs.ali_pay AS bs_ali_pay, bs.ali_tm AS bs_ali_tm, bs.wechat AS bs_wechat, bs.taobao_star AS bs_taobao_star, bs.sex AS bs_sex, bs.birth_day AS bs_birth_day, bs.qq AS bs_qq, bs.brushed AS bs_brushed, bs.recommand_screen_shot_url AS bs_recommand_screen_shot_url, bs.star_screen_shot_url AS bs_star_screen_shot_url, bs.ali_pay_screen_shot_url AS bs_ali_pay_screen_shot_url, bs.state AS bs_state, bs.create_time AS bs_create_time, bs.nickname AS bs_nickname, bs.introduce_id AS bs_introduce_id, bs1.nickname AS bs_introduceName, bs.age AS bs_age, bs.consumption_level AS bs_consumption_level, bs.delivery_address AS bs_delivery_address, bs.taobao_screen_shot_url AS bs_taobao_screen_shot_url, bs.wechat_QR_code AS bs_wechat_QR_code, bs.remarks AS bs_remarks, bs.user_id AS bs_user_id
FROM brush_user t1 INNER JOIN brush_subscriber_user bs on t1.id = bs.user_id INNER JOIN brush_subscriber_user bs1 on bs.introduce_id = bs1.user_id
and (bs.nickname LIKE '%${condition.keywords}%' or bs.real_name like '%${condition.keywords}%')
and bs.phone_number LIKE '%${condition.phoneNumber}%'
and (bs.create_time > #{condition.stime} and bs.create_time < #{condition.etime})
or bs.state = #{state}
order by ${condition.sortName}
DESC
ASC
